title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8058.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8058.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) IR 95. The
northbound and southbound roadways of IR 95 between the New Jersey - New York
state line and the Bronx-Westchester county line in the Counties of New York
and Bronx; except that the entire section has operating limitations during
morning and evening peak traffic periods and usage is restricted from the left
lane. (b) IR 295. The northbound
and southbound roadways of IR 295 between IR 95 and IR 495 in the Counties of

Bronx and Queens; except that the entire section has operating limitations
during morning and evening peak traffic periods and usage is restricted from
the left lane. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8058.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
